data.message:
This is not related, but suddenly  Ican 't see the "about" tab on the left of a person's profile page. The first one is "photos", then "friends" and that's it. Where did the rest of the categories go? 
I have them all enabled so it isn't my fault really. :)

replies.message: Hey Ieva. Some people may chose to hide their About section. You can learn more about that here: http://on.fb.me/1mE3Huz. -Jordan

Thank you for the response! 

The problem is I can't even see it on my own profile and I have allowed it. Just yesterday it was there.
